name: WireGuard Easy v15
description: WireGuard Easy v15 - Complete rewrite with new features and improved UI. Access your homeserver from anywhere with this modern VPN solution. NOTE: This is v15 which has breaking changes from v14. If you're currently using v14, please backup your configuration before migrating.
longDescription: WireGuard Easy v15 - Complete rewrite with new features and improved UI. Access your homeserver from anywhere with this modern VPN solution. NOTE: This is v15 which has breaking changes from v14. If you're currently using v14, please backup your configuration before migrating.
